description:
Third party logistics company seeks 10 Dock Clerks with route guide and outbound experience to work full-time at their South Gate, CA facility. You will work 10-hour shifts reading and creating bills of lading.

$$ EARN $17-$18 PER HOUR $$

ADDED BONUSES AVAILABLE

WORK EITHER DAYS OR NIGHTS!

Available Shifts:

  • Day Shift: 5AM to 3:30PM ($17 per hour)
  • Night Shift: 5PM to 3:30AM ($18 per hour)

To be considered for these Dock Clerk positions, you must have:

  • Route guide and outbound experience.
  • At least 2 years of prior warehouse experience in a 3PL environment.
  • Experience reading and creating bills of lading.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office, including Excel.

Don’t miss out on these excellent positions with a top freight distributor! Apply TODAY to start your next great role as a Dock Clerk, or Call: 310-362-0647 to schedule an interview
